EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Virtual User Group Beta_2018.Approved April 1 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: April 1 PCF User Group Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hooray!
We’re looking forward to seeing you on April 1, 2019. Please {{my.april12019:default=click here}} to add this meeting to your calendar.
PCF User Group will be in Room 125
1:00 PM Lunch & Welcome
1:30 PM Keynote with Cornelia Davis
2:00 PM Hear from your Peers - Users talk about their experiences
3:00 PM Ask the experts - Pivotal product expert roundtables
Break & Networking
4:00 PM ISV roadshow
Retrospective and feedback
5:00 PM Cocktail Reception
Should you have any questions, please email Madison Schlegel at mschlegel@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mschlegel@pivotal.io]]>.
